price: The chiefs of his people said, “We certainly see that you are clearly misguided.”
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
